common.error_occurred: An error occurred while trying to create a Revoke.cash popup. Please reach out about this in our <0>Discord</0>.
common.intention: Please make sure this is your intention.
common.trust_website: Please make sure you trust this website.

confirm_allowance.bypassed: This website bypassed the Revoke.cash confirmation process and is trying to request an approval on <0>{{hostname}}</0>!
